text: Taylon Nicolas Correa Marcolino (born 16 March 1995), or simply Taylon, is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a forward for Valletta. ==Career== On 25 June 2019, Taylon signed a two-year contract with Botev Plovdiv, playing five times for the club before leaving by mutual consent on 26 August 2019. On 18 September 2019 Taylon confirmed, that he had joined Al Urooba in the United Arab Emirates.New Challenge 💚 Al Orooba 🇦🇪, facebook.com, 18 September 2019 ==References== ==External links== *Profile at Soccerway *Profile at Ogol *Taylon at Footballdatabase Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Associação Atlética Internacional (Limeira) players Category:Hibernians F.C. players Category:PFC Botev Plovdiv players Category:Al Urooba players Category:Criciúma Esporte Clube players Category:Valletta F.C. players Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:UAE First Division League players Category:Expatriate footballers in Malta Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Malta Category:Expatriate footballers in Bulgaria Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Bulgaria Category:Expatriate footballers in the United Arab Emirates Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in the United Arab Emirates Category:Association football forwards
title: Taylon Correa
